name: Collection Game
description:
Title: Coin Grabber

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You start off in a contained environment. Grab the coins before time runs out!

Instructions: move with WASD keys or arrow keys, and space bar to jump. Look around with the mouse. Grab all the coins before the timer runs out. 

Game Design Team: Rain Baldridge - Game Designer
